Content:
I recently bought a cbr150 throttle body with the IAC valve and the tps-map sensor. The problem is that I don't know the pinout of neather of the both.

The TPS-MAP has 5 pins and the IAC valve is a stepper and has 4 pins.
Title: Honda CBR150 TPS-MAP AND IAC valve pinout
Author: cabello.puentes16
